title: Bitstream Fleischman
content:
There's a new Fleischmann out there:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/fleischman-bt-pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123074138/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/fleischman-bt-pro/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/fleischman-bt-pro/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/fleischman-bt-pro/regular/charmap...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123074138/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/fleischman-bt-pro/regular/charmap.html?vid=397837&cpselect=UNI78 "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/fleischman-bt-pro/regular/charmap.html?vid=397837&cpselect=UNI78")

Any impressions?
author: loremipsum

comments.content:
Well, I will definitely buy this version over DTL version.

The only thing I don’t like is the italic “w”:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123074138im_/http:/typophile.com/files/714815ecc51b2c6daee4b3ba68a21483_6492.png)

The loop should be tilted.

Mikey :-)

Coles\> I wonder if Bitstream has a studio library like Font Bureau— you gotta pony up the big bucks for the good stuff.

Mikey :-)
